title: Why am I displayed as a level 5...?
body: So I'm a level 30, ranked Silver 1. Played this game for a year. Decided to check on the forums for once and when I tried to post a message told me I need to be at least a level 7. Apparently I'm a level 5. Help?

replies.body: Sometimes it just takes a little push to get your Boards level to sync up with your actual Summoner level. It looks like posting here in H&S was the push it needed, since you're showing as level 30 for me now ^_^!

That it is :D

Thanks for replying anyways.
